text: Duane Reade is a chain of pharmacy and convenience stores. It is owned by Walgreens Boots Alliance. Its stores are primarily in New York and in New Jersey. They are known for high-volume, small store layouts in densely populated Manhattan locations. It was founded in 1960. == Other websites == * Official website Category:Retail companies of the United States Category:Companies based in New York City Category:1960 establishments in the United States Category:1960s establishments in New York (state)
title: Duane Reade
